Ingredients.4: 10 ounces shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided

Ingredients.5: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese, divided

Ingredients.8: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in sausage. Cook and stir until sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, about 10 minutes. Drain and discard any excess grease.

Directions.3: Spread butter on the inside of each English muffin half. Arrange buttered English muffins in the prepared baking dish; top with half the sausage, half the Cheddar cheese, and half the mozzarella cheese.

Directions.4: Whisk eggs, sour cream, and green chilies together in a large bowl; pour evenly over sausage and cheese layer. Top with remaining sausage, Cheddar cheese, and mozzarella cheese. Cover and chill for 8 hours.

Directions.5: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.6: Bake strata in the preheated oven until lightly browned and set in the middle, about 35 minutes. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
